page.title: 16BALLINDALLOCH SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: Social gatherings and sports consist of W.R.I.Meetings,Clay Pigeon Shoots,Darts Competitions,Conservation Meetings,and activities like Badminton, Curling,Bingo and Highland Dancing.Fund-raising events, such as Whist-Drives,Coffee Evenings,Sponsored Activities, are held to raise money for Charities,Summer Outings and Christmas Parties. Popular hobbies include stamp and coin collecting;organ, piano and bagpipe playing;golfing,horse-riding, fishing,gardening, woodwork, knitting,drawing and painting,nature study,and caring for pets. Favourite indoor games are darts, snooker,computer games,card games, and board games like draughts, chess and scrabble.Another favourite pastime is, of course,watching television.
